properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Kristesu prabhuvu thana rakhtamichi konnatti sanghamuna yevaru cheredaro vaare dhanyulu paralokame vaaridi{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Apostalula bodhanu nammi stiraparacha badina vaare aatma shakhito vaaru yellappudu sanghamulo nilichedaru{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Parishuddulatho sahavaasamunu evaru Kaligiyunduro vaare pondedaru kshemabhivruddhi kristesu prabhuvu nandu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Prabhu deharakhtamunu thini thraagu vaare thanayandu nilichedaru prakatinchedaru aayana marana punarutthaanamunu vaaru{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Pattu vadalaka sanghamutho koodi evaru Praadhinchedaro praardhana dwaraa saataanu kriyalu bandhinchedaru vaare{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Kristesu prabhuni raakada koraku evareduru choochedaro nityaanandamuto saakshya Mitchedaru sarvalokamunandu{/lang-eng}
